Cursed Run.NAME: Cursed Run
Cursed Run.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you defeat a Boss, become Cursed.

Double Elites.NAME: Double Elites
Double Elites.DESCRIPTION: Double the amount of elite encounters.

Fat Deck.NAME: Fat Deck
Fat Deck.DESCRIPTION: You cannot skip choosing card rewards.

Night Terrors.NAME: Night Terrors
Night Terrors.DESCRIPTION: Resting at campfires heal 20% of your HP, rather than 30%.

Restless Journey.NAME: Restless Journey
Restless Journey.DESCRIPTION: You no longer heal when entering new levels.

Slow Start.NAME: Slow Start
Slow Start.DESCRIPTION: Start with 1 additional Strike and Defend.

Turtle.NAME: Turtle
Turtle.DESCRIPTION: Start with 1 less Strike and 1 additional Defend.

Vintage.NAME: Vintage
Vintage.DESCRIPTION: The Merchant's prices are increased by 25%.
